chat.msg: Welcome!
thanks
You're welcome! I'm ready to start navigating. Please give me the instructions on which direction to go and what objects to encounter along the way. Where should I go first?
ok you know how on the starter island where it shows a checkmark for where you found the treasure chest? that's where you start
Got it! So I'm starting at the checkmark on the starter island. What do I see around me?
there is a big snake on that island, it looks friendly tho, not to worry
Noted! I see a friendly snake on the starter island. Which direction should I go from here?
head across to the island to your left (east), where you'll see giraffes
Great! I'll head east towards the island with the giraffes. I am now on the island with the giraffes. What do I see next?
next you see a big rock bridge, you'll need to croass that to an island with elephants
Understood! I see a big rock bridge ahead. I'll cross the bridge to the island with the elephants. I am now on the island with the elephants. What's next?
ok this is a little tricky right here, you'll have to step across or climb up a big black rock, then time it just right to run across an alligator's back to get to the next island
Hmm, this sounds challenging! I'll try my best. So, I need to step or climb over a big black rock, then run across an alligator's back to reach the next island. Let me know when I should proceed.
ok once you (hopefully) survive the alligator, you'll get to an island with big frogs, they look friendly but poisonous
Yikes, those frogs sound interesting and dangerous! I'll make sure to be cautious. I've crossed the alligator and arrived at the island with the big frogs. What's the next step?
ok now you cross another rockbridge to get back to the island with the elephants and macaws. stay on the side with the macaws.

Got it! I'll cross the rock bridge to return to the island with the elephants and macaws. I'll make sure to stay on the side with the macaws. I am now back on the island with the elephants and macaws. What should I do next?
go across a tree log to get to the island with the tigers
Alright, I'll go across the tree log to reach the island with the tigers. I'm now on the island with the tigers. What do I see next?
ok on your right you'll see an island with big butterflies. Don't go there. head straigt across to the other island
Got it! I'll avoid the island with the butterflies and head straight across to the other island. I have now reached the other island. What's next?
you'll find the treasure map
Fantastic! I have found the treasure map. According to the map, the treasure is two steps east of the snake. I'll make my way there now. *finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
thanks
You're welcome! Let's start our adventure. Look around and describe what you see near you.
ok i'm sitting on some blankets with a picnic basket and some food, there is a dog with me
Great! You're starting in the right place. Now, stand up and take a few steps to your left. What do you see now?
I see a river with logs that you can use to cross
Good observation! Now, cross over the logs and head south. Describe what you see on the other side of the river.
I see a deer on my right and an old couple sitting on a park bench
Excellent! Keep going south and let me know what you come across next.
I cannot go south, i would go off the map.
Apologies for the confusion. That was my mistake. Instead of going south, let's go back north across the logs to the starting point. Let me know when you're there.
I need to go north
Apologies for the miscommunication. Please go north across the logs, back to the starting point where the dog is. Let me know once you're there.
I see a couple biking
Great! Now, go past the biking couple and head west. Let me know what you encounter next.
I see a vegetable stand
Almost there! Instead of going to the vegetable stand, take a left turn and continue going west. Let me know what you see after that.
If I take a left turn I go off the map
Apologies for the confusion. Please ignore the left turn and continue going straight past the vegetable stand. Let me know what you see after that.
this is aggrevating
I apologize for the frustration. Let's refocus and continue our journey. From the vegetable stand, go straight ahead and describe what you come across next.
sorry
No need to apologize! Let's keep going. From the vegetable stand, continue straight ahead and describe what you see next.
straight ahead is the creek continuing then the map stops
Apologies for the confusion. Let's backtrack a bit. From the vegetable stand, take a U-turn and head back towards the starting point with the white dog. Let me know once you're there.
ok
Great! Now that you're back at the starting point with the white dog, let's try again. This time, go south across the log bridge. What do you see on the other side?
you go EAST, not south and it's the couple and a deer
Apologies for the confusion in my previous instruction. You're absolutely correct. From the starting point, cross the log bridge and go east. Describe what you see as you head in that direction.
see above
Apologies for the miscommunication. This time, cross the log bridge and go east. Let me know when you see a big green bush.
ok
Great! Now, go east, passing by the big green bush. What do you see a few steps ahead?
the couple sitting on a park bench
Perfect! Now, let's continue our journey. Move south between the couple on the park bench and another wooden branch. What do you see next?
a bush
Good job! Now, let's change direction. Move east, going between the branch and the bush. Let me know what you see after that.
bush
Apologies for the confusion. Let's try again. From the branch and the bush, go east. You should come across a brown young deer. Can you see it?
yest but it's towards the WEST, NOT EAST

Apologies for the mistake in my previous instruction. You're right. From the branch and the bush, go west, and you should come across a brown young deer. Well done! You have reached your final objective.
ty

You're welcome! I apologize again for the confusion earlier. Thank you for your patience. I hope you enjoyed our little adventure. If you would like to play again or have any other questions, feel free to let me know!
Ok how do I end this chat, do I have to sit here and wait for three min

No need to wait! You can end the chat at any time by simply closing the window or exiting the chat application. If you have any more questions or need assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
I cannot do that because it would close my work task and I would not get paid
I apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you need to keep the chat open to complete your work task, please let me know. I'll be here to assist you until you're ready to end the chat.

chat.msg: Welcome!
thanks
You're welcome! Are you ready to give me instructions to navigate on the map?
start at the house, look straight ahead. see the guy with the telescope?
I apologize for the confusion, but I am currently at the starting point, which is the tent at the north of the map. Could you please provide instructions starting from here?
according to me it shows that you start at the house at the south end since there is an X at the tent
I apologize for the miscommunication. Let me correct myself. I am currently at the house at the south end of the map. What would you like me to do from here?
I apologize for any confusion. Let's start from the house at the south end of the map. What should I do from here?
see the guy with the telescope? walk past him and then head north, you'll see a car on your right, then turn left, you'll see a fire and a dog, at the dog head north to the tent
Got it! Starting from the house, I walk past the guy with the telescope and head north. Now, I see a car on my right. Should I turn left at this point?
yes
Great! I turned left at the car. Now I see a fire and a dog. Should I continue heading north from the dog to reach the tent?
yes
Understood. I continued heading north from the dog, and now I have reached the tent. Thank you! What would you like me to do next?
end the chat
Alright, thank you for playing the game! If you have any more questions or need any further assistance, feel free to ask. Have a great day!

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! Are you ready to start the game? Can you please describe where you are and what you see around you?
I see a big red crab, ocean and to my left is a shark
Great! You're on the right track. Now, I want you to turn right and go along the big rock in the water. Keep heading west. Let me know when you've reached a third, medium-sized rock.
ok I see a blue, yellow and white beach ball

Excellent! You're doing great. Now, cross between the medium rock and the blue-yellow-white beach ball, and continue heading north. Let me know when you reach a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right.
ok i'm there

Awesome job! Now, veer slightly left and head towards the northwest. Keep going until you cross between the red tent on your left and the larger speaker on your right. Let me know once you've done that.
ok I see palm trees

Great progress! You're almost there. Now, circle around the red tent in an arc and continue heading south towards the sea. But don't reach the water just yet. Once you reach the shore, make a right turn (west) and go below a red kayak. Let me know when you've done that.
ok I'm standing at the shore line

Awesome! Now, turn 90 degrees to your right (north) and follow along the kayak. Keep going until you reach a small green bush. That's your final objective. Let me know when you've reached the small green bush.
ok I'm there!

Congratulations! You did it! You successfully followed the path and reached the small green bush. Well done! I hope you enjoyed the game. Feel free to explore the area or let me know if you want to play again.
thank you, no I'm good please just end the chat so I don't have to sit here and wait 5 min, thanks so much
Apologies for any inconvenience caused. If you have any more questions or need further assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day! Goodbye!
thanks Mr. Chatbot, but I'm just stuck here waiting until about 2.5 more minutes are up
I apologize for the inconvenience. I'll end the chat now. If you need any assistance in the future, don't hesitate to ask. Take care and have a wonderful day! Goodbye!
thanks you too
You're welcome! Thank you and have a great day ahead! Goodbye!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I get upset with my brain honestly, I rarely mix languages, I have a so called language ear
